heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy from the Green Mountains west, and Rt. 2 north, with scattered snow showers, likely in the northern Green Mountains and northern NY. A dusting to 2 inches, higher in NY. Partly cloudy southeast. Blustery. Lows ranging through the 20s. Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Any early sun southeast giving way to clouds. Scattered snow showers in the south, likely north. A dusting to 2 inches, greater over the northern mountains. Still blustery. Highs from the upper 20s to upper 30s, north to south. West winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers and periods of blowing snow, likely in the northern mountains and southern Greens. Lows mainly in the low to mid 20s. West winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Becoming mostly sunny south. Periods of clouds, and any snow showers in the northeastern mountains, giving way to increasing periods of afternoon sun. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, low to mid 30s south. West to northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.
